# wireshark-manual

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wireshark-manual
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wireshark-manual
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wireshark-manual
wireshark-manual <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wireshark-manual
wireshark-manual <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
